wikipedia_page.main: Jessie Eliza Bateman (2 August 1877 – 14 November 1940) was an English stage actress.  Bateman began her career as a child actress.  After early success on tour in Shakespearean roles, she built her career both in London and foreign tours.  She had her greatest success in the early years of the 20th century, and her career spanned over half a century.
